signatures.note: Quire marks are written with Ethiopic numerals in the upper inner corner of the first leaf of quires from to , from to , and .

item.q: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘአፈጸመኒ፡ ዘንተ፡ መጽሐፈ፨ በዳኅና፡ ወበሰላም፡ ይቤ፡ ጸሐፊሁ፨

item.desc: Spaces for the name of the owner have been sometimes left unfilled.
